SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETCORRESPONDENT
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Get the correspondent on a sponsorship (gifted sponsorship recipient)
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_SPONSORSHIP_GETCORRESPONDENT(
@sponsorshipID uniqueidentifier = null ) returns uniqueidentifier with execute as caller as begin
declare @correspondent uniqueidentifier = null
if @sponsorshipID is not null select @correspondent = case when SPONSORSHIP.CONSTITUENTID = REVENUE.CONSTITUENTID or REVENUE.ID is null then null else SPONSORSHIP.CONSTITUENTID end from dbo.SPONSORSHIP left join dbo.REVENUESPLIT on REVENUESPLIT.ID = SPONSORSHIP.REVENUESPLITID left join dbo.REVENUE on REVENUE.ID = REVENUESPLIT.REVENUEID
where SPONSORSHIP.ID = @sponsorshipID
return @correspondent end
